title: The Skyrider - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Xuanhuan
tags: Game Elements   Gate to Another World   Genius Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Romantic Subplot   Skill Creation   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong
author: Chen Xiaobai   辰小白
description:
“The strongest system, I am the strongest! And only me!”

Ye Feng looked at the people whom the Gods favored, his face indifferent! With the strongest system, he can copy other’s cultivation methods, skills, and can also upgrade the level…

Which means he is omnipotent, and the strongest in the world! Now, let’s go and hit all who are dissatisfied!>
